Hello all! I want a team to make a fable game on scratch. We will be working on the first all the way to the third.
Message me of what you want to do and what you want to contribute. Down bellow are the jobs that are required.

Programmer:
In order to become a Programmer, you will have to basically program the game, to make the stuff other's do become a finished project. As many as needed are requested, however, if you can do another job, we need some of everything. Programmers will be responsible for programming the characters, linking everything together, programming the scrolling of the map, collision detection. Text boxes, basically, turning it from a mess of graphics, sounds, and more into a finished project. If you are one, please do NOT steal code from other's projects. However, you can take code from your own projects.

Story Writer
The Story Writer's will be in charge of creating the story, and all story-related quests. Typically, one or two will be in charge of the regular story, and a third person for text boxes, etc.

Graphic Designer:
I want the game to look like the fable games. I want it to look like a halo graphics. It should look real yet cartoon like.

Music Writer:
Whoever is in charge of this job, will be responsible for making a few tracks. I will ask to make the tracks as we go along because even i don't know how many tracks are needed.

Thank you for wanting to work in this collab.
